Title: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's Picture Drama
Description: ['A picture drama released on the BD Box Set of ', Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's, '. Subaru, Teana, Vivio host a radio show promoting their own BD Box Sets. This episode is the continuation of the ', Iryou Shoujo Medical Shamal, ' picture drama episode that was included on the ', Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha: The Movie 2nd A's, ' BD release.']
